title: City-State Blues
alt: The Enduring Bond outfit from Infinity Nikki

content.html: There's one thing in Dragon Age II (ah, how I wish I could call it Dragon Age: Exodus) I'd like to see again in a new fantasy RPG, and it's that idea of the whole story taking place in just one city: to have all companions residing and living their lives in its different districts, and to see the culture change over years of side-questing for its citizensâ€”as a foreigner. And with a narrative framed by Varric.
